articles.title: COVID-19: WHO warns of half a million more virus-related deaths by spring across Europe - Sky News

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Brexit Britain comes to EU's rescue as it releases oil reserves to combat Russia crisis - Daily Express
articles.description: THE UK has come to the European Union's (EU's) rescue and will release up to 1.5 million barrels of oil to combat a supplies shortage inflamed by Russia, Iran and members of the OPEC Plus group.

articles.author: Simon Nicholas Williams
articles.title: Four ways to stop COVID ruining Christmas again in 2021 - The Conversation Africa
articles.description: Countries across Europe are reintroducing lockdowns, but the UK can keep Christmas and New Year on track by following these sensible steps.
articles.content: This autumn the UK has had between 30,000 and 50,000 new COVID cases each day, and globally cases are rising again after months of steady decline so much so that many countries are reintroducing meas… [+5585 chars]
